labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64 Creator Update, latest Canary
data.short_description: Apostrophes show as "&#039" in link embeds
data.steps_to_repro: - Embed a Link (I used <https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/friis/2016/08/25/setup-iis-with-url-rewrite-as-a-reverse-proxy-for-real-world-apps/>) - Look at the Author part (small text above everything, in this case it says "Blog de l&#039..")
